articles.title: 35-yr-old from Kerala is India’s first monkeypox case; Centre sends team
articles.description: Kerala Health Minister Veena George said the infection was diagnosed in a 35-year-old man who had returned from the UAE this week. The infected person is believed to have come in contact with another confirmed case in the emirates, George said.
